description:
Hi I am trying to invoke the Nova Rest API using Jclouds. When i see auth_tokens table i am seeing the server_management_url with out the port number and i am getting the Resouce not found exception. Is this correct? Or there should be port number in the URL being invoked? server_management_url | cdn_management_url | +---------------------------------------------+--------------------+ | http://16.23.45.23/v1.1/inp | | the exception thrown is 1953 [i/o thread 0] DEBUG org.jclouds.http.internal.JavaUrlHttpCommandExecutorService - Sending request 1448084050: GET http://16.23.45.23/v1.1/inp/servers/detail?format=json&now=1337826699109 HTTP/1.1 1953 [i/o thread 0] DEBUG jclouds.headers - >> GET http://16.23.45.23/v1.1/inp/servers/detail?format=json&now=1337826699109 HTTP/1.1 1953 [i/o thread 0] DEBUG jclouds.headers - >> Accept: application/json 1953 [i/o thread 0] DEBUG jclouds.headers - >> X-Auth-Token: 4be626b2231faba70f8cda991c04feefdf7d789d 2391 [i/o thread 0] DEBUG org.jclouds.http.internal.JavaUrlHttpCommandExecutorService - Receiving response 1448084050: HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found 2391 [i/o thread 0] DEBUG jclouds.headers - << HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found 2391 [i/o thread 0] DEBUG jclouds.headers - << Date: Thu, 24 May 2012 02:32:21 GMT 2391 [i/o thread 0] DEBUG jclouds.headers - << Vary: Accept-Encoding 2391 [i/o thread 0] DEBUG jclouds.headers - << Keep-Alive: timeout=15, max=99 2391 [i/o thread 0] DEBUG jclouds.headers - << Connection: Keep-Alive 2391 [i/o thread 0] DEBUG jclouds.headers - << Server: Apache/2.2.14 (Ubuntu) 2391 [i/o thread 0] DEBUG jclouds.headers - << Content-Type: text/html; charset=iso-8859-1 2391 [i/o thread 0] DEBUG jclouds.headers - << Content-Length: 314 2391 [i/o thread 0] DEBUG jclouds.wire - << "[\n]" 2391 [i/o thread 0] DEBUG jclouds.wire - << "[\n]" 2391 [i/o thread 0] DEBUG jclouds.wire - << "404 Not Found[\n]" 2391 [i/o thread 0] DEBUG jclouds.wire - << "[\n]" 2391 [i/o thread 0] DEBUG jclouds.wire - << "

Not Found

[\n]" 2391 [i/o thread 0] DEBUG jclouds.wire - << "

The requested URL /v1.1/inp/servers/detail was not found on this server.

[\n]" 2391 [i/o thread 0] DEBUG jclouds.wire - << "
[\n]" 2391 [i/o thread 0] DEBUG jclouds.wire - << "
Apache/2.2.14 (Ubuntu) Server at 16.23.45.23 Port 80
[\n]" 2391 [i/o thread 0] DEBUG jclouds.wire - << "[\n]"
title: Nova API invocation

comments.content:
